name: Dreaming Rainbow
description:
1. About this game
This is a horror game where you walk through the 3D hospital space and solve mysteries.
You will experience a nurse day in the nurse's view.
Mysterious phenomena occur frequently.
Through the experience, the truth comes to light.

* The player moves through a 3D space.
* Solve the mystery by investigating and acquiring items.
* Sometimes you have to avoid strange phenomena.
* A horror game controlled by mouse and keyboard.


2. Prologue
One night, a big thunderstorm roars.
The protagonist heads for the hospital.
When arriving at the hospital, the power seems to be out due to the thunder.
In order to restore the power, walk and turn on the switches in each room.
But, mysterious phenomena occur in everywhere.


3. operation
Walk: WASD
Run: Shift+WASD
Check: Left click
Release an object: Right click
Menu: R
